definition: Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Diabase-porphyrite was the splitting product of passive margin of Gondwana Continent in Late Jurassic.
sentences.chinese: 輝綠玢岩是岡瓦納被動陸緣在晚古生代裂解的產物。

sentences.english: Ancient molecules can also expose relationships among long-dead species;
sentences.chinese: 古生代分子也可以揭示滅絕很久的物種之間的關係。

sentences.english: The stratigraphic column in this district includes all the paleozoic formations .
sentences.chinese: 這個地區的地層柱包括全部古生代巖系。

sentences.english: Northern Xinjjiang is characterized by complicated geologic structure and intense volcanic activities of Palaeozoic .
sentences.chinese: 新疆北部地質構造複雜，古生代火山活動很強烈。

sentences.english: There are three types of mineralization fluid in Later Paleozoic sedimentary basin in North-Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 粵北晚古生代沉積盆地存在三種類型的礦化流體。

sentences.english: There are few studies about palaeozoic tensionalnormal fault of in Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 目前對塔里木盆地古生代張性正斷裂的研究尚少。

sentences.english: They are mainly living in the Paleozoic .
sentences.chinese: 它們主要生活在古生代。

sentences.english: The Qinling orogenic belt was formed from the Late Paleozoic to the Triassic.
sentences.chinese: 秦嶺造山帶形成於晚古生代至三疊紀。

sentences.english: North Qilian range was a intercontinental micro-oceanic basin of Early Paleozoic.
sentences.chinese: 早古生代北祁連是一個陸間微洋盆。

sentences.english: The ocean basin became more narrow in early Late Paleozoic, which last several millions years.
sentences.chinese: 晚古生代早期的洋盆較狹窄，生存時間爲數千萬年。

sentences.english: Bogda was a rift basin in late Palaeozonic.
sentences.chinese: 博格達山屬於晚古生代的陸間裂谷。

sentences.english: On this basis the paleogeographical changing process during the Paleozoic in the eastern Qinling is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上探討了東秦嶺古生代古地理變遷過程。

definition: pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
